title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Mathematics Education Expert Simulations for Enhancing International Mobility Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in mathematics education and basic understanding of international educational environments
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can implement at least three mathematics teaching methods that consider cultural differences in VR simulation environments
Learners can complete tasks using effective communication strategies in international team project scenarios
Learners diagnose the eight core competencies (self-awareness, language adaptability, etc.) derived from Delphi technique workshops at a measurable level using self-assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
